name: Ring The Bell (MatteoPalazz)
description:
This is a little game where you are a child that want to win the "ring the bell" game, but he isn't enought strong to do it by himself, so he have to search help...

I hope you like it...

---------------------------------------------------------

Hi, I'm a 16 yers old Italian game developer.

This is my first game!

The 3d assets are self made!

Thanks to my sister for the Cover and Main Menu image.

 https://www.instagram.com/soxa.pazza/?hl=it
